titleStmt.title: The Christian souldier his combat, conquest, and crowne. Agaynst the three arch-enemies of mankind. The world, the flesh and the devill.
titleStmt.author: Turges, Edward.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by R.H. for J.S. and are to be sold by Bernard Laugford at the signe of the blew Bible at Holborn bridg,

notesStmt.note: The two final leaves consist of an errata and an imprimatur leaf.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the blew Bible at Holborn bridg
